items.label: Utilisation of trucks in decarbonisation scenario
Light duty trucks
items.fallbackSource: Assuming light trucks can reach average urban distribution today. The "normal" utilisation rate is 45% for trucks used for urban distribution, and 70% for trucks used for long distance, according to ACEA (2010) Commercial vehicles and CO2

items.label: Heavy duty trucks
items.fallbackSource: Assuming heavy duty trucks can reach almost same rate as long-haul today (60% out of 70%). According to the ACEA report, the "normal" utilisation rate is 45% for trucks used for urban distribution, and 70% for trucks used for long distance
